abstract: The U.S. stock market hits a four-month high on hopes for a decent economic recovery.
snippet: The U.S. stock market hits a four-month high on hopes for a decent economic recovery.
lead_paragraph: The American stock market moved to a four-month high Monday. The S.&P. 500-stock index closed at 1,142.71. That is the highest level since May 13, just before the summer round of economic pessimism and dismay began to take root.
